GET /api.description: json body that displays all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: returns an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: returns an array of all articles that can be filtered and ordered through queries

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: returns an article object that contains metadata
